graphql.query:
mutation ($region: String!,
        $date: String!, 
        $deaths: Int!, 
        $confirmed_cases: Int!, 
        $recoveries: Int!, 
        $tested: Int!){
    updatecovStat(region: $region,
        date: $date, 
        deaths: $deaths, 
        confirmed_cases: $confirmed_cases, 
        recoveries: $recoveries, 
        tested: $tested){
        date, 
        deaths, 
        confirmed_cases, 
        recoveries, 
        tested,
        region
    }
}

request.description: DSA Ass1 Problem 2. GraphQL post function to update region info
